member.name: _SHSTOCKICONINFO
member.summary: Receives information used to retrieve a stock Shell icon. This structure is used in a call .

member.name: _SHSTOCKICONINFO.cbSize
member.summary: The size of this structure, in bytes.

member.name: _SHSTOCKICONINFO.hIcon
member.summary: When is called with the SHGSI_ICON flag, this member receives a handle to the icon.

member.name: _SHSTOCKICONINFO.iSysImageIndex
member.summary: When is called with the SHGSI_SYSICONINDEX flag, this member receives the index of the image in the system icon cache.

member.name: _SHSTOCKICONINFO.iIcon
member.summary: When is called with the SHGSI_ICONLOCATION flag, this member receives the index of the icon in the resource whose path is received in szPath.

member.name: _SHSTOCKICONINFO.szPath
member.summary: When is called with the SHGSI_ICONLOCATION flag, this member receives the path of the resource that contains the icon. The index of the icon within the resource is received in iIcon.
